name: Foundation - The Wise Man Maduro - Macho Raton
additionalNotes: Foundation Cigar Company may be new to your ears, but there's a good chance you've already tasted some blends that their founder had his hands in. Founder and master blender, Nicholas Melillo, of Foundation Cigar Company has nearly 20 years of experience in the cigar industry where he has worked for some of the biggest brands (Drew Estate) and helped blend some very highly rated premiums. Foundation Cigar Company is dedicated to quality, consistency, balance, flavor, and building brands with heart and soul. And it shows in their growing portfolio.
